This app demonstrates all parameters of `update_numeric`:
1. `id`: The identifier of the numeric input to update ("number")
2. `label`: Updated via text input
3. `value`: Updated via numeric input
4. `min`: Updated via numeric input
5. `max`: Updated via numeric input
6. `step`: Updated via numeric input

The app includes:
1. A main numeric input that we'll update
2. Controls for each parameter
3. An action button to trigger the update
4. A display of the current value

The app follows best practices:
- Uses express mode syntax
- Avoids external files
- Minimal components
- Uses reactive programming patterns correctly
- Includes all possible parameters of update_numeric
- Properly structured UI layout

To use the app:
1. Modify any of the parameter inputs
2. Click the "Update Numeric Input" button
3. The main numeric input will update according to the new parameters
4. The current value display will show the latest value

The app demonstrates how each parameter affects the numeric input's behavior while keeping the implementation minimal and focused.
